text: Hi! Every child has challenging behaviour sometimes. If you would like some tips, type "Help".
source_text: Hi! Every child has challenging behaviour sometimes. If you would like some tips, type "Help".

text: Remember that One-on-One time, praise for being good, and consistent routines will also help reduce difficult behaviours.
source_text: Remember that One-on-One time, praise for being good, and consistent routines will also help reduce difficult behaviours.

text: Do your children ever make you feel like screaming? Give yourself a 10-second pause.
source_text: Do your children ever make you feel like screaming? Give yourself a 10-second pause.

text: AUDIO
source_text: AUDIO

text: Breath in and out slowly 5 times. Then try responding in a calmer way. Millions of parents say this helps - A LOT.
source_text: Breath in and out slowly 5 times. Then try responding in a calmer way. Millions of parents say this helps - A LOT.

text: AUDIO
source_text: AUDIO

text: AUDIO
source_text: AUDIO

text: AUDIO
source_text: AUDIO

text: Do you ever feel something so strongly that you want to run away from it? Here's a short activity that might help!
source_text: Do you ever feel something so strongly that you want to run away from it? Here's a short activity that might help!

text: Here is a quick relaxation activity...
source_text: Here is a quick relaxation activity...

text: Sit down and close your eyes.
source_text: Sit down and close your eyes.

text: How many sounds can you hear? Listen to the sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers.
source_text: How many sounds can you hear? Listen to the sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers.

text: Try again for another ten seconds. Did you hear any new sounds? Did you hear any sounds inside your own body? Notice how you feel now.
source_text: Try again for another ten seconds. Did you hear any new sounds? Did you hear any sounds inside your own body? Notice how you feel now.

text: Let’s use the magic power of three stay present and relax. At the end of a tough day, thinking of three things to be grateful for can help us find the courage to try again tomorrow.
source_text: Let’s use the magic power of three stay present and relax. At the end of a tough day, thinking of three things to be grateful for can help us find the courage to try again tomorrow.

text: Here's a short relaxation activity to end the day:

text: Let's take a moment to stop what you are doing and connect with your breath.

text: Thank you for your dedication! The world needs more men like you.
source_text: Thank you for your dedication! The world needs more men like you.

text: Every time you take a pause is an act of kindness. Be kind to yourself and your family today!
source_text: Every time you take a pause is an act of kindness. Be kind to yourself and your family today!

text: Every time you take a pause is an act of kindness. Be kind to yourself and your family today!
source_text: Every time you take a pause is an act of kindness. Be kind to yourself and your family today!

text: It’s not always easy to be a woman in this world. But you are leading the way!
source_text: It’s not always easy to be a woman in this world. But you are leading the way!

text: Your commitment is an inspiration. Keep calm and carry on!
source_text: Your commitment is an inspiration. Keep calm and carry on!

text: You made it to the end of the day! Now it’s time for you. You deserve a break!
source_text: You made it to the end of the day! Now it’s time for you. You deserve a break!

text: You made a difference today just by showing up. Your down time starts now!
source_text: You made a difference today just by showing up. Your down time starts now!

text: Taking care of yourself is taking care of your kids! Keep it up!
source_text: Taking care of yourself is taking care of your kids! Keep it up!

text: Thank you for showing up for your family today and try your best! Your effort is appreciated!
source_text: Thank you for showing up for your family today and try your best! Your effort is appreciated!

text: Sorry to hear that you are struggling. It is perfectly normal to have difficult days, especially during these stressful times. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that you are struggling. It is perfectly normal to have difficult days, especially during these stressful times. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. I know it can be really tough. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. I know it can be really tough. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. You deserve a star just for trying. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. You deserve a star just for trying. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that you are going through a tough time. You are not alone. Reach out to a friend or someone you can talk to for support. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that you are going through a tough time. You are not alone. Reach out to a friend or someone you can talk to for support. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that you are struggling. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that you are struggling. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that you are struggling. Take a moment to reflect on one thing that went well for you today. Even the smallest things can help. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that you are struggling. Take a moment to reflect on one thing that went well for you today. Even the smallest things can help. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that you are having a tough time with your child. These things take time and patience to change. Be kind to yourself and know that you are not alone. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that you are having a tough time with your child. These things take time and patience to change. Be kind to yourself and know that you are not alone. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear you are struggling. Give yourself a big hug for trying. Tomorrow is another day. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear you are struggling. Give yourself a big hug for trying. Tomorrow is another day. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. It’s not always easy to be a parent during these difficult times. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. It’s not always easy to be a parent during these difficult times. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. There’s no such thing as a perfect parent or the perfect child. We are all just trying our best! Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. There’s no such thing as a perfect parent or the perfect child. We are all just trying our best! Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that you are struggling. Parenting can be very difficult at times. Take a pause and remind yourself that you are trying your best. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that you are struggling. Parenting can be very difficult at times. Take a pause and remind yourself that you are trying your best. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. Sometimes it’s easy, sometimes it’s not. Let go of the mistakes and celebrate the wins, however small! Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult between you and your children. Sometimes it’s easy, sometimes it’s not. Let go of the mistakes and celebrate the wins, however small! Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult. Whatever you feel you did ‘wrong’ today, let it go and try again tomorrow. It’s ok!
source_text: Sorry to hear that things are difficult. Whatever you feel you did ‘wrong’ today, let it go and try again tomorrow. It’s ok!

text: Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
source_text: Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".

text: It can be much more fun doing something with another person than doing it by yourself.
source_text: It can be much more fun doing something with another person than doing it by yourself.

text: Here is a link to the messages that you can share with a friend!
source_text: Here is a link to the messages that you can share with a friend!

text: *insert link*
source_text: *insert link*

text: Congratulations for finishing the ParenText programme!
source_text: Congratulations for finishing the ParenText programme!

text: You can always revisit the parenting tips by typing "Help". If you want to stop receiving messages, go to "Technical Support" and then select "User Experience".
source_text: You can always revisit the parenting tips by typing "Help". If you want to stop receiving messages, go to "Technical Support" and then select "User Experience".

text: You have added one skill to your Parenting Toolkit this week:

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers
source_text: You have added @results.n_skills_week skills to your Parenting Toolkit this week:

text: Type "Toolkit" if you want to go back and revisit any of these tips.
source_text: Type "Toolkit" if you want to go back and revisit any of these tips.
